name: speedcontrol-util
description: Node.js package with utilities to help you code NodeCG bundles that interface with the nodecg-speedcontrol bundle.
author: zoton2

scripts.copy-schemas: trash schemas && shx cp -r node_modules/nodecg-speedcontrol/schemas schemas
scripts.copy-types:nodecg: trash types/nodecg && shx cp -r node_modules/nodecg/types types/nodecg
scripts.copy-types:speedcontrol: trash types/speedcontrol && shx cp -r node_modules/nodecg-speedcontrol/src/types types/speedcontrol && cd types/speedcontrol && shx rm schemas/.eslintrc.js .eslintrc.js shims-vue.d.ts VueDraggable.d.ts ParseDuration.d.ts tsconfig.json
